index.license: CEA CNRS Inria Logiciel Libre License, version 2.1 (CeCILL-2.1)
index.name: windrose

name: windrose
raw_recipe:
package:
    name: windrose
    version: 1.6

source:
    fn: windrose-1.6.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/w/windrose/windrose-1.6.tar.gz
    md5: 6394781fae13fc36bd9b8523475e9e4d
    patches:
        - setup-patch.patch

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - matplotlib
        - numpy

test:
    imports:
        - windrose

about:
    home: https://github.com/scls19fr/windrose
    license: CEA CNRS Inria Logiciel Libre License, version 2.1 (CeCILL-2.1)
    summary: Python Matplotlib, Numpy library to manage wind data, draw windrose.

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf

about.license: CEA CNRS Inria Logiciel Libre License, version 2.1 (CeCILL-2.1)
about.summary: Python Matplotlib, Numpy library to manage wind data, draw windrose.
